message: I started funding this on kickstarter and put together a high end gaming system for it. The pre-alpha is fantastic and the development they are releasing is fantastic in both graphics and gameplay.

I got promoted twice while pumping at work. Women have, on average, 2.5 children over the course of 50 or so years in the workforce. The number of women that will need to pump during work in the same time period in the same workplace is going to be a pretty low percentage. Plus, most employers already do this out of basic human decency. When I worked in an office and pumped twice a day, I took my laptop with me and continued to work. I took way less break time than the smokers.

Michael Moore you did it! Went to see your movie last night and it was moving, inspiring and enlightening. Amazing! i think it is your best work to date. Don't let these haters who cannot open their minds enough to see that being critical of your country is the only way to make it better. It is actually because you LOVE our country so much that you are trying to bring this into the light so we can fix it! Thank you for doing what you do. It is people like you that have helped make this country what it is today!
